items.title: Kodular - No Code App Creator
items.summary: Interested in Making Android App or have a good idea, but don't know to code. Don't worry we got you a new toy !! Kodular - A Modern App Creator, is a Distribution of MIT App Inventor. A Blocky based Android App Development Platform. Developing Applications is as…
items.content_html:
Interested in Making Android App or have a good idea, but don't know to code. Don't worry we got you a new toy !!
 

Starting here is so simple, just head to their homepage, click on Create Apps and log in using any desired option. It will take you to Kodular Creator. Where you will turn Ideas to Apps. There click on create new project, a pop-up will appear enter your project name then configure your project setting and click on Finish and Congratulations your Project is Created 🥳

Now as your project is created, let's see how to use the Creator. When your Project is Opened, you will see an Interface for creating apps called Designer. Where it has Component Platte at Left an Android Device Mockup at Center and a Properties tab at Right along with some Buttons in the top menu.

‌I personally recommend and use Kodular for Creating Professional Applications. I am also Available on Kodular Community and had Published Several Basic/Advance Guides for Kodular. You can also ask your Issue/Query there. The Kodular Community is One of the best and Active Community in all AI2 Distros. The Users and Staff there are so helpful and give their best to give you the solution to your problem.

Here are Some Recommendations for Getting Started.
 
  • Kaffeine TV
  • Kodular
  • Pixii Bomb

Hope this article helped you to gain some new and Interesting Information, if so then share this to your Family and Friends also.

Have Questions about this article or another, Join our LOGYC Realm on telegram and ask your doubts.

 

Happy Koding

Peace ☮️

items.title: How to Show Download Progress With Circular Progress | Guide
items.summary: Welcome, This is my First Guide and I was to Curoius to Publish it. I saw many user requesting for an method to do use Circular progress to Show Download Progress If Anyone Dont Want to use Use the Download Component Provided By Kodular. Design…
items.content_html:
Welcome, This is my First Guide and I was to Curoius to Publish it.

I saw many user requesting for an method to do use Circular progress to Show Download Progress

 

 
  • Import Two Extensions


  2. If Anyone Dont Want to use Use the Download Component Provided By Kodular.

  • Designer
  1.  for creating the ring.
  2.  As your Requirement for Start, Stop & Resume, Etc.

Design As per Your requirement.

  • Blocks
    On Screen Initialize 

  1. Set an Arrangement Where the Ring will be Created.

  2. Set the Download Link. 

  3. Set the RingBgColour,RingFgColourEnd,RingFgColourStart 

  4. On Start Button Click start download  and Set clock to enable 

  5. while file is Downloading set progress to Ring Percent 

  6. On timer Start

  • Properties of Components

 

 

 

Apk: DPWCP_Maayur.apk (5.2 MB)

Aia:DPWCP_Maayur.aia (119.0 KB)

Credits: Thanks @CarlosPedroza27 for Circular Progress Extension Deephost  for custom Download Extension &  for Such a Great Platform.

I have used a Circular Progress Extension for this guide.

 
 Circular Progress Extension (Preview) Extensions

The Download link is not working here so I found a working link in AppyBuilder Community.

Circular Progress Extension (Preview) 

Try it and give suggestion and Report Bug If found.

Thanks Kodular For a great Platform. 

Happy Koding 

Peace ☮️

items.content_html:
So Welcome, Everyone today in this guide I will show how to show any Arrangement/Component (Visible) as a Notifier or a Pop-Up. This Guide is Advance/Modified Version of @nikzdreamer2001’s Top Sheet Guide. It is fully Customisable According to your needs.
So Let’s Begin

1. Components

So Basically we need Three Arrangement’s

  4. And we need Animation Utilities & Phase

Set properties As in Screenshot.

Remember the Screen Arrangement is your screen and all your components will go there.

Now lets complete Notifier Array work.

Now take a arrangement and make a notifier according to your need. For Eg. I have made a Exit Notifier.

Make sure that the titlebar is not visible

Your Designer Work is Completed, Now let’s head toward’s the blocks.

2. Blocks

• Procedure

Input : If you have multiple notifier then pass the block of arrangement that you want to show.
Cancelable : You can also make it Cancelable to True/False by user.

Here we are using Animation Utilities to bring the Notifier Arrangement On Top of All Arrangements and Used Phase to Animate the Notifier.

• Call Notifier

By Using the Procedure call the notifier
And you can also make it Cancelable to True/False by user.

• Cancel Notifier

To cancel the notifier use this

3.Download

Aia : aia.aia (330.7 KB)

4. Credit/Reference

Top Sheet Guide by @nikzdreamer2001

 Make Top Sheet in Kodular Resources That’s why i have set height of…

Thanks Kodular For a great Platform. 

Happy Koding

items.title: Create Multiple (Unlimited) Webview/Tabs Dynamically | Guide
items.summary: Create/Remove/Switch WebviewFollow the below steps to create/Tabs Webviews Dynamically Id- For Assigning a Unique Id for Each webview Url- Url’s for Webview. *You can add textbox to enter Desired Url This Procedure will be used to switch the visibility of Webviews. Webview will br created Dynamically.
items.content_html:
• Create/Remove/Switch Webview

Follow the below steps to create/Tabs Webviews Dynamically

1. Components




2. Blocks

  • Variables

Id- For Assigning a Unique Id for Each webview

Url- Url’s for Webview. *You can add textbox to enter Desired Url

  • Procedure

This Procedure will be used to switch the visibility of Webviews.

  • Create Webview/Tabs

Webview will br created Dynamically. All the blocks should be in same order.

Create webview- Webview is created using a Unique Id.

Visibility (Procedure) - Currently created webview is set to visible.

Set webview - currently created webview is set as active so all the properties,events will be related to current webview.

  • Switch Webview/Tabs

A List Picker will visible with a list all available webview. Selected Webview will be visible.

  • Remove Webview/Tabs

 

 
A List Picker will visible with a list all available webview. Selected Webview will be removed.

If all the webview will be removed then all the values will be reset.

 

Download :

Apk:CreepyApricotLeopard.apk (5.2 MB)
Aia:CreepyApricotLeopard.aia (62.7 KB)

Refrences :

Custom Webview By @vknow360

 
 CustomWebView : An extended form of Web Viewer Extensions

By Using your own logic this can be customised to a better design. This is just a refrence to how to dynamically create webviews.

Thanks Kodular For a great Platform. 

Happy Koding 

Peace ☮️
